含义: The character '互' means 'mutual' or 'each other'. It is used to describe a reciprocal relationship or interaction between two or more parties.
字形: The character '互' is composed of two parts: the top part resembles two hands reaching out to each other, and the bottom part is a simplified form of '又' (again), symbolizing repetition or mutual action.
读音: The pronunciation of '互' is 'hù' in Mandarin Chinese.
字源: The character '互' originated from ancient Chinese pictographs, where it depicted two hands interlocking or interacting, symbolizing mutual exchange or cooperation.
成语: 互不相让 (hù bù xiāng ràng) - neither willing to give in
互惠互利 (hùhuì hùlì) - mutual benefit and reciprocity
互通有无 (hùtōng yǒu wú) - mutual exchange of what one has and what one needs
例句: 他们互相帮助，共同进步。 (They help each other and make progress together.)
互联网改变了我们的生活方式。 (The internet has changed our way of life.)
短故事: 在古代，有两个村庄因为一条河流而互相争斗。后来，他们意识到只有互相合作才能解决水源问题，于是他们建立了互惠的关系，共同管理河流。
两个朋友因为误会而互不相让，最后通过沟通和理解，他们重新建立了互相信任的关系。
诗词:
《互》
互不相让争高下，
互惠互利共繁荣。
互通有无心相连，
互助友爱永长存。

《互联网》
互联网连天下心，
互帮互助共前行。
互惠互利同发展，
互信互爱永不停。
